mapper.select: SELECT DAE_CD, DAE_NM, USE_YN FROM DAE_CD WHERE DAE_CD = #{dae_cd}
SELECT DAE_CD, DAE_NM, USE_YN FROM DAE_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAE_CD ( DAE_CD, DAE_NM, USE_YN, INPUT_ID, INPUT_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{dae_cd}, #{dae_nm}, #{use_yn}, #{input_id}, NOW(), #{update_id}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE DAE_CD SET DAE_NM = #{dae_nm}, USE_YN = #{use_yn}, UPDATE_ID = #{update_id}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE DAE_CD = #{dae_cd}
